law.history: Repealed 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 151, sec. 14, effective June 17, 1954. -- Amended 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 190, sec. 2. -- Created 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 97, sec. 7.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Control and management of state sanatoria and their funds and property -- Power to receive property; donations -- Reports to Governor.
